Package oop

Class MailSystem

java.lang.Object
oop.MailSystem
Direct Known Subclasses:
EnhancedMailSystem
public class MailSystem
extends java.lang.Object
Represents a System for the admin ans implements general operations
Author:
Leandro F. Gomez Racca, Miriam Gertrudix Pedrola
